TITLE: Self-Reflection And Goal Setting
DEF: Negotiation and definition of goals of learning and standards of achievement
TASK: The Self-Reflection and Goal Setting pattern cultivates students' self-awareness and encourages ownership of their learning journey. It supports setting clear objectives, tracking progress, and adjusting strategies to boost performance. For this pattern to flourish, fostering a habit of self-reflection in learners is crucial, as it allows them to identify strengths and weaknesses, adapt to new challenges, and stay motivated.
